# DominanceBot Agent â€” Build Instructions
#
# This builds the desktop agent into a single .exe file
# that players download and double-click.
#
# Prerequisites:
#   pip install pyinstaller requests
#
# Build:
#   pyinstaller --onefile --name DominanceBot --icon icon.ico agent.py
#
# The .exe will be in dist/DominanceBot.exe
#
# Players also need these files alongside the .exe (or in %APPDATA%/DominanceBot/bot/):
#   - RLBotServer.exe  (from https://github.com/RLBot/core/releases)
#   - bot.exe           (the PPO bot, compiled separately)
#   - bot.toml          (auto-generated on first match)
#
# Optional: bundle RLBotServer.exe into the agent with:
#   pyinstaller --onefile --name DominanceBot --icon icon.ico \
#     --add-data "bot/RLBotServer.exe;bot" \
#     --add-data "bot/bot.exe;bot" \
#     agent.py
